评论概述: Not at all for plus size
评论详情: I purchased a 3X based off the sizing chart. This coat was in no way a 3X. It says the bust is 48". I have a 46" bust and there was at least a foot of space where I couldn't close it. The arms were very tight too. I was really bummed because the emerald color is so pretty and the coat was lightweight but it wasn't even close to fitting.

I read reviews before I bought it saying to size up, but I would advise sizing up at least two sizes if your a busty girl like myself. I normally get a Large, but got an extra large. Definitely should have gone up one more size. I can zip and button the corset, but it's quite tight in the chest, uncomfortable, and limits my movement quite a bit. I realized if I leave it unzipped and only do the buttons, it helps noticeably. The corset also cuts off way up from your belly button, so you either need to wear something beneath it or wear pants/skirt that can be pulled up (unless you're comfortable showing your midriff). Otherwise, it gets the job done if your plan to wear it for a costume. Fabric is nice, buttons are definitely on the cheaper side, so don't strain them, design is great.
